Shipping container price surge to reverse due to overcapacity -logistics platformHigher prices for containers used by merchant ships caused by attacks on Red Sea shipping are likely to fall back in three to nine months to levels seen in early December due to market overcapacity, the head of an online container logistics platform said on Wednesday. The Li clan will deal their way out of value trapLi Ka-shing, Asia’s original tycoon, converted to shareholder religion nearly a decade ago when he carved up his Hong Kong-based empire. Though investors supported the deal, they have rapidly lost faith in the company as Sino-American tensions rise. Solving the value conundrum will be a top priority for his son Victor Li in 2024.
